mapper.update:
UPDATE distribution_mode_item
merchant_Id = #{merchantId},
shipping_code = #{shippingCode},
distribution_mode = #{distributionMode},
is_default = #{isDefault},
platform_id = #{platformId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
WHERE id = #{id}
